availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Severin (Hopkins County, Ky, brick maker )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, brick maker. Native of Germany. Married to Malinda Hill Severin in Webster County, Kentucky, in 1862. Father of Henry Severin. Brick maker in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 639.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, Dixon, p. 199B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Webster County Marriages, Film #000568132, p. 227.
"George W. Severin (1835-1923)," Find A Grave, Memorial #41712605, accessed December 9, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/41712605.
